background_description: The background consists of dark, blurred rock or coral structures, possibly with some sandy substrate at the bottom. Small white particles are scattered throughout the water, indicating an aquatic environment.
explanation: The image features a vibrantly colored Copperband Butterflyfish with prominent orange and white vertical stripes. Its bright coloration and distinct patterns contrast sharply with the dark, muted background, clearly indicating the absence of any camouflage.
